FuncDef: The license verify command verifies the license files of the master main control boards.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the license file to be verified.
The value is a string of 5 to 127 characters without spaces. The extension of a file is ".dat" or ".zip".

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The verification result may be one of the following:
Verify license failed
The check failure may be caused by the invalid License file, unmatched ESN, unmatched product model, or unmatched version information.
Verify license succeeded
If the result is "Verify license succeeded", this license file can be activated.

Prerequisites
The license file has been loaded to the master main control boards of the current device.
